item.title: Backhaul Upgrades For Wireless Broadband
item.description:

While the focus was on wireless channels as the potential constraint, it’s the insufficient backhaul capacity that’s now jeopardizing the expansion of wireless services. Fortunately, this issue is being acknowledged and addressed. But what exactly is backhaul, and how does it impede mobile services?
